data.system_settings: ASUS Zenfone max pro m1 Android 8.1.0
data.actual_result: The status of the song played before skipping still shows and does not go away Even after track bar reaches the end (not local , viewed the status from another phone )
data.expected_result: Spotify status should no longer be displayed
data.short_description: Spotify status still shows after disabling "display Spotify as status"  option
data.steps_to_repro: - Play a song on Spotify and wait for discord to detect it - Go to settings > connections > Spotify > disable "display Spotify as status"  - Skip your song  - Restart your app
